Literature.Title: Insights into the Mechanism of Antimicrobial Activity of Seven-Residue Peptides.
Literature.Author: Pandit G, Ilyas H, Ghosh S, Bidkar AP, Mohid SA, Bhunia A, Satpati P, Chatterjee S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC90=>=500µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC90=>=500µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC90=>=500µM),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC90=>=500µM)
